render_info.source_dynamic: SELECT at.Id as Id, at.Name as Name, FORMAT(at.CreatedDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as CreatedDTG, e.Username as Creator, FORMAT(at.UpdateDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as UpdateDTG, CASE at.isDeleted WHEN 0 THEN N'Còn hiệu lực' ELSE N'Đã xóa' END AS Status FROM [dbo].[AwardingType] at join [dbo].[adm_Employee] e on at.CreateUserId = e.EmployeeID
